FuncDef:
The authentication keychain command establishes a keychain authentication for the PCE connection.
undo authentication keychain cancels the keychain authentication of PCE connection.
By default, no keychain authentication is established for a PCE connection.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a keychain name. The keychain name is configured using the keychain command.
The value is a string of 1 to 47 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
PCEP authentication between PCE Client and PCE Server.
Prerequisites
PCE connect-server need to be configured on PCE Client prior to this command.
PCEP domain role should be configured as PCE Client.
Configuration Impact
After disposing successfully, with assigning the conversation between client uses keychain to authenticate.
Precautions
User should use the same keychain configuration in the PCE Client, otherwise the pce session will be break off or cannot be set up.
